settings-contact.title: Contact Information
settings-contact.content:
The contact information section allows you to update the church's contact details that appear on the website.

  • Email Address: The main contact email displayed on the website
  • Phone Number: The church phone number
  • Address: The physical address of the church
  • Google Maps URL: Optional link to the church location on Google Maps

Changes are saved when you click "Save All Settings" at the top of the page.

settings-media-youtube.title: YouTube Integration
settings-media-youtube.content:
Configure YouTube integration to display videos on the Audio/Sermons page.

  • Channel ID: Enter your YouTube channel ID to show all videos from the channel
  • Playlist ID: Alternatively, enter a specific playlist ID (optional)

If both are set, the Channel ID takes priority. You can find your Channel ID in your YouTube Studio settings.

settings-media-spotify.title: Spotify Integration
settings-media-spotify.content:
Add your Spotify podcast/show URL to display episodes on the Audio/Sermons page.

Enter the full URL from Spotify (e.g., https://open.spotify.com/show/...). This will enable the Spotify player on the audio page.

settings-display-popup.title: Latest Message Popup
settings-display-popup.content:
Control whether the latest YouTube message popup appears on the homepage.

  • When enabled: Shows the latest YouTube video recorded in the last 5 days
  • When disabled: The Event Highlight Banner can be shown instead

Note: When enabled, this popup overrides the Event Highlight Banner. The Event Highlight Banner is controlled in the Events section by checking the "Highlight" checkbox on individual events.

booking-tickets.title: Selecting Tickets
booking-tickets.content:
Choose the tickets you need for the conference.

  • Click "Add" to add tickets to your booking
  • Use the + and - buttons to adjust quantities
  • Early bird pricing is automatically applied if available
  • You can apply a discount code if you have one

The first adult ticket will automatically be set as the Group Leader.

booking-attendees.title: Attendee Details
booking-attendees.content:
Enter information for each attendee in your booking.

  • Group Leader: The first adult attendee is automatically set as the Group Leader
  • Required fields: Full name for all attendees; email, address, and church for Group Leader
  • Date of Birth: Required for Teen and Child tickets

If you have no adult attendees, you'll need to provide separate Group Leader details.

booking-payment.title: Payment Options
booking-payment.content:
Choose how you'd like to pay for your booking.

  • Pay in Full: Pay the entire amount now
  • Pay 20% Deposit: Pay 20% now, balance due before the conference
  • Pay Deposit + Installments: Available if enabled for this conference

After payment, you'll receive a confirmation email with your booking reference.

admin-conferences.title: Conferences Management
admin-conferences.content:
Manage conference bookings and settings from this page.

  • Create Conference: Click "New Conference" to add a new event
  • Edit: Click on a conference to edit its details
  • Bookings: View and manage all bookings for conferences
  • Ticket Types: Configure different ticket types for each conference

admin-dashboard.title: Admin Dashboard
admin-dashboard.content:
Welcome to the admin dashboard. This is your central hub for managing all aspects of the website.

  • Quick Access: Use the cards below to navigate to different sections
  • Conferences: View statistics and manage conference bookings
  • Network & Media: Manage churches, events, podcasts, and images
  • Content: Edit pages, policies, and site content

Your access level determines which sections you can view and edit.

admin-conferences-page.title: Conferences Management
admin-conferences-page.content:
Manage all conferences from this page.

  • Create Conference: Click "New Conference" to add a new event
  • Edit: Click on a conference title to edit its details
  • Ticket Types: Configure different ticket types for each conference
  • Bookings: View and manage all bookings for conferences
  • Reports: Generate reports and statistics

Conferences must be published to appear on the public website.

admin-conferences-title.title: Conference Title
admin-conferences-title.content: The main title of the conference that appears on the website and in emails.

admin-conferences-slug.title: URL Slug
admin-conferences-slug.content: The URL-friendly version of the title. This appears in the website URL (e.g., /conference/my-conference-title). Use lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only.

admin-conferences-dates.title: Conference Dates
admin-conferences-dates.content: Set the start and end dates for the conference. These dates are used for calendar integration and booking deadlines.

admin-conferences-venue.title: Venue Information
admin-conferences-venue.content: Enter the venue details where the conference will be held. This information appears on the conference page and in booking confirmations.

admin-conferences-published.title: Published Status
admin-conferences-published.content: When published, the conference appears on the public website. Unpublished conferences are only visible in the admin area.

admin-conferences-registration.title: Registration Open
admin-conferences-registration.content: Controls whether new bookings can be made. When closed, the booking form is disabled but existing bookings remain accessible.

admin-pages-page.title: Pages Management
admin-pages-page.content:
Manage all website pages including the homepage.

  • Edit Pages: Click on a page to edit its content
  • Sections: Pages can have multiple sections with different content types
  • Images: Add and manage images for each section
  • Rich Text: Use the editor to format text content

Changes are saved automatically when you click "Save".

admin-team-page.title: Team Management
admin-team-page.content:
Manage team members displayed on the website.

  • Add Member: Click "Add Team Member" to create a new entry
  • Edit: Click on a team member to edit their information
  • Photo: Upload a profile photo for each team member
  • Order: Drag and drop to reorder team members

admin-events-page.title: Events Management
admin-events-page.content:
Manage events and their bookings.

  • Create Event: Add new events with dates and details
  • Ticket Types: Configure different ticket options for each event
  • Bookings: View and manage event bookings
  • Highlight: Mark events to show on the homepage banner

admin-bookings-page.title: Bookings Management
admin-bookings-page.content:
View and manage all conference bookings.

  • Filter: Use filters to find specific bookings
  • Status: View payment status (Paid, Partial, Unpaid)
  • Details: Click on a booking to view full details
  • Bulk Actions: Select multiple bookings for bulk email or actions

admin-users-page.title: Admin Users
admin-users-page.content:
Manage admin user accounts and access levels.

  • Full Access: Can access all admin features including settings
  • Editor Access: Can manage content, pages, and media
  • Conference Access: Can only manage conferences and bookings

Only Full Access users can manage other admin users.

admin-images-page.title: Image Management
admin-images-page.content:
Upload and manage images for use throughout the website.

  • Upload: Click "Upload Image" to add new images
  • Search: Use the search bar to find specific images
  • Use: Click on an image to copy its URL or use it in content

admin-podcasts-page.title: Podcasts Management
admin-podcasts-page.content:
Manage podcast episodes and audio content.

  • Add Episode: Create new podcast episodes with audio files
  • Categories: Organize episodes by category
  • Publish: Control which episodes appear on the website

admin-churches-page.title: Churches Management
admin-churches-page.content:
Manage network churches displayed on the website.

  • Add Church: Add new churches to the network
  • Details: Include address, contact info, and description
  • Order: Reorder churches to control display order

my-account.title: My Account
my-account.content:
Your account dashboard where you can manage your bookings and profile.

  • Bookings: View all your conference and event bookings
  • Payment Status: See payment status and make additional payments
  • Profile: Update your contact information

If you need to make changes to a booking, please contact support.

field-conference-id.title: Conference ID
field-conference-id.content: A unique identifier for this conference. Used internally for database references. Use lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only.

field-conference-description.title: Conference Description
field-conference-description.content: A detailed description of the conference. This appears on the conference page and can include rich text formatting (bold, italics, lists, links).

field-conference-end-date.title: End Date
field-conference-end-date.content: The end date of the conference. If left blank, it will default to the start date. Used for calendar integration and booking deadlines.

field-conference-start-time.title: Start Time
field-conference-start-time.content: The daily start time for the conference. Optional field for displaying specific daily timings on the conference page.

field-conference-end-time.title: End Time
field-conference-end-time.content: The daily end time for the conference. Optional field for displaying specific daily timings on the conference page.

field-conference-schedule.title: Schedule
field-conference-schedule.content: A detailed schedule or agenda for the conference. This could include session times, speakers, and activities. Supports rich text formatting.

field-venue-name.title: Venue Name
field-venue-name.content: The name of the venue where the conference will be held (e.g., "City Convention Center").

field-venue-address.title: Venue Address
field-venue-address.content: The street address of the venue.

field-venue-city.title: Venue City
field-venue-city.content: The city where the venue is located.

field-venue-postcode.title: Venue Postcode
field-venue-postcode.content: The postal/zip code of the venue location.

field-venue-country.title: Venue Country
field-venue-country.content: The country where the venue is located.

field-conference-images.title: Conference Images
field-conference-images.content: Upload images associated with the conference. These images will be displayed on the conference page. You can select multiple images.

field-supporting-pages.title: Supporting Pages
field-supporting-pages.content: Link to additional content pages that provide more information about specific aspects of the conference (worship, activities, accommodation, etc.).

field-paypal-enabled.title: PayPal Enabled
field-paypal-enabled.content: Enable PayPal payment processing for this conference. Attendees will be able to pay via PayPal when this is enabled.

field-pay-later-enabled.title: Pay Later Enabled
field-pay-later-enabled.content: Enable "Buy Now, Pay Later" functionality. This allows attendees to pay a deposit and make installments.

field-deposit-amount.title: Deposit Amount
field-deposit-amount.content: A fixed deposit amount in pounds (£). If set, this takes priority over deposit percentage. Leave blank to use percentage instead.

field-deposit-percentage.title: Deposit Percentage
field-deposit-percentage.content: The percentage of the total ticket price required as a deposit (0-100%). Used if deposit amount is not set.

field-installment-count.title: Installment Count
field-installment-count.content: The number of installments for payment plans (2-12). The total amount minus deposit will be divided into this many payments.

field-installment-interval.title: Installment Interval
field-installment-interval.content: The number of days between each installment payment. Minimum 7 days. For example, 30 means payments are due every 30 days.

field-team-id.title: Team Member ID
field-team-id.content: A unique identifier for this team member (e.g., "john-watson"). Used internally and in URLs. Use lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only.

field-team-name.title: Team Member Name
field-team-name.content: The full name of the team member as it will appear on the website.

field-team-category.title: Team Category
field-team-category.content: The category this team member belongs to (e.g., "Leadership Team", "Conference Ministry Team"). Used to group members on the team page.

field-team-role.title: Team Member Role
field-team-role.content: The role or position of the team member (e.g., "Senior Pastor", "Conference Coordinator").

field-team-image.title: Team Member Image
field-team-image.content: The URL or path to the team member's profile photo. Click "Select Image" to choose from uploaded images.

field-team-quote.title: Team Member Quote
field-team-quote.content: A quote or brief statement from the team member that will be displayed on their profile.

field-team-social.title: Social Media Links
field-team-social.content: Links to the team member's social media profiles (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn). These will appear on their profile.

field-settings-email.title: Contact Email
field-settings-email.content: The main contact email address displayed on the website. This is the email visitors will see and use to contact the church.

field-settings-phone.title: Contact Phone
field-settings-phone.content: The church's phone number displayed on the website.

field-settings-address.title: Contact Address
field-settings-address.content: The physical address of the church displayed on the website.

field-settings-googlemaps.title: Google Maps URL
field-settings-googlemaps.content: Optional link to the church location on Google Maps. This allows visitors to get directions easily.

field-youtube-channel.title: YouTube Channel ID
field-youtube-channel.content: Your YouTube channel ID to display all videos from the channel on the Audio/Sermons page. You can find this in YouTube Studio settings.

field-youtube-playlist.title: YouTube Playlist ID
field-youtube-playlist.content: Optional: A specific YouTube playlist ID. If both channel ID and playlist ID are set, the channel ID takes priority.

field-spotify-url.title: Spotify URL
field-spotify-url.content: The full URL to your Spotify podcast or show (e.g., https://open.spotify.com/show/...). This enables the Spotify player on the audio page.

field-user-email.title: Admin User Email
field-user-email.content: The email address for the admin user account. This will be used for login and notifications.

field-user-name.title: Admin User Name
field-user-name.content: The full name of the admin user. This is displayed in the admin interface.

field-user-password.title: Admin User Password
field-user-password.content: The password for the admin user account. Choose a strong password. Leave blank when editing to keep the existing password.

field-user-access-level.title: Access Level
field-user-access-level.content:
The permission level for this admin user:

  • Full Access: Can access all features including settings and user management
  • Editor Access: Can manage content, pages, and media
  • Conference Access: Can only manage conferences and bookings

field-event-id.title: Event ID
field-event-id.content: A unique identifier for this event. Used internally and in URLs. Use lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only.

field-event-title.title: Event Title
field-event-title.content: The title of the event as it will appear on the website and in event listings.

field-event-info.title: Event Information
field-event-info.content: Detailed information about the event. This can include description, what to expect, and other relevant details. Supports rich text formatting.

field-event-date.title: Event Date
field-event-date.content: The date when the event will take place. Required field.

field-event-time.title: Event Time
field-event-time.content: The time when the event will take place (e.g., "7:00 PM"). Optional field.

field-event-location.title: Event Location
field-event-location.content: Where the event will be held. This can be a venue name, address, or general location description.

field-event-image.title: Event Image
field-event-image.content: The URL or path to an image for this event. This image will be displayed in event listings and on the event page.

field-event-order.title: Event Order
field-event-order.content: A number used to control the display order of events. Lower numbers appear first. Events with the same order are sorted by date.

field-page-title.title: Page Title
field-page-title.content: The title of the page as it appears on the website. This is used to automatically generate the page ID (URL slug).

field-page-is-link.title: This is a Link
field-page-is-link.content: When checked, this becomes a navigation link instead of a page. Use for external URLs, anchor links, or custom paths. Links don't have page content.

field-page-link-url.title: Link URL
field-page-link-url.content:
The URL for the link. Can be:

  • Anchor link: /#section-id or /page-id#section-id
  • Relative path: /page
  • External URL: https://example.com

field-page-link-target.title: Link Target
field-page-link-target.content: How the link should open. Use 'New Window' for external URLs, 'Same Window' for internal links.

field-page-show-in-navigation.title: Show in Navigation Menu
field-page-show-in-navigation.content: When enabled, this page or link will appear in the main website navigation menu.

field-page-navigation-label.title: Navigation Label
field-page-navigation-label.content: Custom label for the navigation menu. If left empty, the page title will be used.

field-page-hero-title.title: Hero Title
field-page-hero-title.content: The main title in the hero section. You can use HTML like <span style="color:#4BB170;">text</span> for colored text.

field-page-hero-subtitle.title: Hero Subtitle
field-page-hero-subtitle.content: The subtitle text displayed in the hero section below the title.

field-page-hero-buttons.title: Hero Buttons
field-page-hero-buttons.content: Add buttons to display in the hero section. Each button can have custom text, link, style (primary/secondary), and target (same/new window).

field-page-hero-messages.title: Hero Messages (Rotating Subtitles)
field-page-hero-messages.content: These messages will rotate in the hero section. Leave empty if you don't want rotating messages.

field-page-about-label.title: About Label
field-page-about-label.content: Small text that appears above the About section title (e.g., "About Us").

field-page-about-title.title: About Title
field-page-about-title.content: The main title for the About section on the home page.

field-page-about-content.title: About Content
field-page-about-content.content: The content text for the About section. Supports rich text formatting.

field-page-about-image.title: About Image
field-page-about-image.content: The image displayed in the About section on the home page.

field-page-vision-label.title: Vision Label
field-page-vision-label.content: Small text that appears above the Vision section title.

field-page-vision-title.title: Vision Title
field-page-vision-title.content: The main title for the Vision section on the home page.

field-page-vision-text.title: Vision Text
field-page-vision-text.content: The content text for the Vision section.

field-page-section-label.title: Section Label
field-page-section-label.content: Small text that appears above the section title (optional).

field-page-section-title.title: Section Title
field-page-section-title.content: The main title for this content section.

field-page-section-image.title: Section Image
field-page-section-image.content: An image to display in this section. Click 'Select Image' to choose from uploaded images.

field-page-section-content.title: Section Content
field-page-section-content.content: The main content for this section. Supports rich text formatting with the editor.

field-page-section-cta.title: Call to Action
field-page-section-cta.content: Optional button/link at the bottom of the section. Includes link URL and button text.

field-page-column-title.title: Column Title
field-page-column-title.content: The title for this column in a multi-column section.

field-page-column-content.title: Column Content
field-page-column-content.content: The content for this column. Supports rich text formatting.

field-event-id.title: Event ID
field-event-id.content: A unique identifier for this event. Used internally and in URLs. Use lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only. Auto-generated from title.

field-event-title.title: Event Title
field-event-title.content: The title of the event as it will appear on the website and in event listings.

field-event-info.title: Event Information
field-event-info.content: Detailed information about the event. This will be displayed on the event detail page. Supports rich text formatting.

field-event-date.title: Event Date
field-event-date.content: The date when the event will take place. Required field.

field-event-time.title: Event Time
field-event-time.content: The time when the event will take place (e.g., "7:00 PM"). Optional field.

field-event-location.title: Event Location
field-event-location.content: Where the event will be held. This can be a venue name, address, or general location description.

field-event-image.title: Event Image
field-event-image.content: The URL or path to an image for this event. This image will be displayed in event listings and on the event page.

field-event-featured.title: Featured Event
field-event-featured.content: When checked, this event will be displayed on the home page in the featured events section.

field-event-highlighted.title: Highlighted Event
field-event-highlighted.content: When checked, this event will show a banner at the top of the website (if the Latest Message Popup is disabled in Settings).

field-event-published.title: Published
field-event-published.content: When checked, the event will be visible on the public website. Unpublished events are only visible in the admin area.

field-event-order.title: Event Order
field-event-order.content: A number used to control the display order of events. Lower numbers appear first. Events with the same order are sorted by date.

field-event-paypal.title: PayPal Enabled
field-event-paypal.content: Enable PayPal payment processing for this event. Required if you want to sell tickets for this event.

field-church-name.title: Church Name
field-church-name.content: The name of the church as it will appear on the website.

field-church-link.title: Website Link
field-church-link.content: The full website URL for this church (e.g., https://www.egcc.co.uk). This will be a clickable link on the website.

field-church-logo.title: Church Logo
field-church-logo.content: The logo image for this church. Click 'Select Logo' to choose from uploaded images. The logo will be displayed on the churches page.

field-church-show-frontend.title: Show on Front End
field-church-show-frontend.content: When checked, this church will be displayed on the public churches page on the website.

field-church-show-conference.title: Show in Conference
field-church-show-conference.content: When checked, this church will be displayed in conference materials and listings.

field-church-hide-all.title: Hide from All
field-church-hide-all.content: When checked, this church will be hidden from both the front end and conference listings. This disables the other visibility options.

field-podcast-title.title: Podcast Title
field-podcast-title.content: The title of the podcast episode as it will appear on the website and in podcast feeds.

field-podcast-description.title: Podcast Description
field-podcast-description.content: A description or summary of the podcast episode. This appears on the website and in podcast feeds.

field-podcast-speaker.title: Speaker
field-podcast-speaker.content: The name of the speaker for this podcast episode.

field-podcast-speaker-email.title: Speaker Email
field-podcast-speaker-email.content: The email address of the speaker. Used for podcast feed metadata.

field-podcast-audio.title: Audio File
field-podcast-audio.content: Upload the audio file for this podcast episode. Supported formats: MP3. Maximum file size: 100MB.

field-podcast-published.title: Published Date
field-podcast-published.content: The date and time when this podcast episode was published. This determines the order in podcast feeds.

field-activity-id.title: Activity ID
field-activity-id.content: A unique identifier for this activity. Used internally and in URLs. Use lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only. Auto-generated from title.

field-activity-title.title: Activity Title
field-activity-title.content: The title of the activity as it will appear on the website.

field-activity-description.title: Activity Description
field-activity-description.content: A detailed description of the activity. Supports rich text formatting.

field-activity-audience.title: Audience
field-activity-audience.content: Who this activity is for (e.g., "For Children & Families").

field-activity-image.title: Activity Image
field-activity-image.content: An image for this activity. Click 'Select Image' to choose from uploaded images.

field-activity-icon.title: Activity Icon
field-activity-icon.content: An icon for this activity. Can be a FontAwesome class (e.g., "fa fa-coffee") or an SVG path. Optional.

field-activity-link.title: Link URL
field-activity-link.content: Optional link URL for this activity. If provided, the activity will be clickable and link to this URL.

field-activity-link-text.title: Link Text
field-activity-link-text.content: The text to display on the link button. If left empty, a default text will be used.

field-group-id.title: Group ID
field-group-id.content: A unique identifier for this community group. Used internally. Use lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only. Auto-generated from day/time.

field-group-day.title: Day
field-group-day.content: The day of the week when this community group meets (e.g., "Monday", "Tuesday").

field-group-time.title: Time
field-group-time.content: The time when this community group meets (e.g., "7:00 PM", "10:00 AM").

field-group-description.title: Description
field-group-description.content: A description of what this community group is about and what happens during meetings.

field-group-icon-color.title: Icon Color
field-group-icon-color.content: The color theme for this group's icon. Choose from available color options.

field-group-order.title: Order
field-group-order.content: A number used to control the display order of groups. Lower numbers appear first.

field-policy-title.title: Policy Title
field-policy-title.content: The title of the policy page as it will appear on the website (e.g., "Privacy Policy", "Terms and Conditions", "Cookie Policy").

field-policy-content.title: Policy Content
field-policy-content.content: The full content of the policy page. This will be displayed on the public policy page. Supports rich text formatting.

field-ticket-name.title: Ticket Name
field-ticket-name.content: The name of this ticket type as it will appear to customers (e.g., "Adult - Non-Camping", "Teen - Camping").

field-ticket-type.title: Ticket Type
field-ticket-type.content: The category of this ticket: Adult, Teen, Child, or Under 2s. This helps organize tickets and may be used for age validation.

field-ticket-camping.title: Camping Option
field-ticket-camping.content: When checked, this ticket includes camping accommodation. Unchecked means non-camping.

field-ticket-regular-price.title: Regular Price
field-ticket-regular-price.content: The standard price for this ticket type in GBP. This is the default price when no early bird or late pricing applies.

field-ticket-early-bird-price.title: Early Bird Price
field-ticket-early-bird-price.content: Optional discounted price for early bird purchases. If set, this price will be used during the early bird period instead of the regular price minus the global discount.

field-ticket-late-price.title: Late Price
field-ticket-late-price.content: Optional higher price for late purchases. If set, this price will be used after the late price start date.

field-ticket-early-bird-end.title: Early Bird End Date
field-ticket-early-bird-end.content: The date when early bird pricing ends for this specific ticket type. After this date, regular or late pricing applies.

field-ticket-late-start.title: Late Price Start Date
field-ticket-late-start.content: The date when late pricing begins for this ticket type. After this date, the late price (if set) will be used instead of the regular price.

field-ticket-capacity.title: Capacity
field-ticket-capacity.content: The maximum number of tickets of this type that can be sold. Set to 0 for unlimited capacity.

field-ticket-min-age.title: Minimum Age
field-ticket-min-age.content: The minimum age required to purchase this ticket type. Used for age validation during booking.

field-ticket-max-age.title: Maximum Age
field-ticket-max-age.content: The maximum age allowed for this ticket type. Used for age validation during booking. Set to 999 for no maximum age.

field-ticket-description.title: Description
field-ticket-description.content: A description of this ticket type that will be displayed to customers during booking. Optional but recommended.

field-ticket-enabled.title: Enabled
field-ticket-enabled.content: When checked, this ticket type is available for purchase. Uncheck to temporarily disable sales without deleting the ticket type.

field-early-bird-start.title: Early Bird Start Date
field-early-bird-start.content: The date when the early bird pricing period begins for all tickets. The global discount amount will be applied during this period.

field-early-bird-end.title: Early Bird End Date
field-early-bird-end.content: The date when the early bird pricing period ends for all tickets. After this date, regular pricing applies unless individual ticket types have their own early bird end dates.

field-early-bird-discount.title: Early Bird Discount Amount
field-early-bird-discount.content: The amount in GBP to discount from each ticket's standard price during the early bird period. This discount applies to all ticket types unless they have a specific early bird price set.

field-discount-conference.title: Conference
field-discount-conference.content: Select which conference this discount code applies to. The code will only be valid for bookings for the selected conference.

field-discount-code.title: Discount Code
field-discount-code.content: The discount code that customers will enter during checkout (e.g., "SAVE20", "EARLYBIRD"). Codes are case-insensitive and will be automatically converted to uppercase.

field-discount-type.title: Discount Type
field-discount-type.content: Choose whether the discount is a percentage (e.g., 20% off) or a fixed amount (e.g., £10 off).

field-discount-value.title: Discount Value
field-discount-value.content: The discount amount. For percentage: enter a number (e.g., 20 for 20%). For fixed amount: enter the amount in GBP (e.g., 10.00 for £10 off).

field-discount-max-usage.title: Max Usage
field-discount-max-usage.content: The maximum number of times this discount code can be used. Set to 0 for unlimited usage. The system tracks how many times the code has been used.

field-discount-expiry.title: Expiry Date
field-discount-expiry.content: Optional date when this discount code expires. After this date, the code will no longer be valid. Leave empty for no expiration.

field-discount-enabled.title: Enabled
field-discount-enabled.content: When checked, this discount code is active and can be used. Uncheck to temporarily disable the code without deleting it.

field-form-label.title: Field Label
field-form-label.content: The label text that will appear above the form field on the booking form. This is what users will see (e.g., "Full Name", "Email Address").

field-form-name.title: Field Name (ID)
field-form-name.content: The internal identifier for this field. Used in the database and form processing. Auto-generated from the label, but can be edited. Use lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores only.

field-form-type.title: Field Type
field-form-type.content: The type of input field: Text Input, Textarea, Email, Phone, Date, Number, Dropdown (Select), Checkbox, or Radio Buttons. Select and Radio types require options to be defined.

field-form-options.title: Field Options
field-form-options.content: For dropdown (select) and radio button fields, define the available options. Each option has a Label (what users see) and a Value (what is stored).

field-form-placeholder.title: Placeholder
field-form-placeholder.content: Optional placeholder text that appears inside the field before the user types. Provides a hint about what to enter (e.g., "Enter your email address").

field-form-help-text.title: Help Text
field-form-help-text.content: Optional additional help text that appears below the field to provide more guidance to users filling out the form.

field-form-required.title: Required Field
field-form-required.content: When checked, this field must be filled in before the form can be submitted. Required fields are marked with an asterisk (*) on the form.

conference-listing.title: Browse Conferences
conference-listing.content:
View all available conferences and find the one that's right for you.

  • Click on a conference: View full details, dates, venue, and ticket information
  • Booking Open: Green badge indicates registration is currently open
  • Conference Details: Each card shows date, venue, and a brief description

Click "Learn More & Book" or the conference card to see full details and start your booking.

conference-details.title: Conference Information
conference-details.content:
This page contains all the information you need about the conference.

  • Description: Learn about what the conference offers
  • Schedule: View the conference timetable and sessions
  • Venue: Find location and address details
  • Supporting Pages: Access additional information about worship, activities, accommodation, and more
  • Ticket Types: See available tickets and current pricing in the sidebar

Click "Book Now" to start your booking process.

conference-ticket-types.title: Understanding Ticket Types
conference-ticket-types.content:
Different ticket types are available for different age groups and accommodation preferences.

  • Adult: For attendees aged 18 and over
  • Teen: For teenagers (age range varies by conference)
  • Child: For children (age range varies by conference)
  • Camping: Some tickets include camping accommodation - look for the green "Camping" badge
  • Non-Camping: Standard tickets without accommodation

Each ticket type shows the current price, availability, and any special notes. Early bird discounts are automatically applied when available.

conference-early-bird.title: Early Bird Pricing
conference-early-bird.content:
Save money by booking early! Early bird pricing offers discounted tickets for a limited time.

  • Automatic Discount: Early bird prices are automatically applied when you select tickets during the early bird period
  • Ending Soon: Orange badge indicates the early bird period is ending within 7 days
  • Regular Price: After the early bird period ends, tickets return to regular pricing

The discount amount is shown on each ticket, and the original price is displayed with a line through it. Book early to secure the best price!

conference-booking-process.title: How to Book
conference-booking-process.content:
Booking a conference is simple and straightforward.

  • Step 1: Select your tickets and quantities
  • Step 2: Enter attendee details (name, email, etc.)
  • Step 3: Complete additional forms for teen/child attendees if needed
  • Step 4: Choose payment method and complete payment
  • Step 5: Receive confirmation email with booking reference

Your progress is saved automatically, so you can return to complete your booking later if needed.

conference-supporting-pages.title: Additional Information
conference-supporting-pages.content:
Each conference may have additional pages with more detailed information.

  • Worship and Ministry: Learn about worship sessions and ministry opportunities
  • Kids Activities: Information about activities and programs for children
  • Youth Activities: Details about teen programs and activities
  • Social Activities: Find out about social events and networking opportunities
  • Accommodation: Learn about accommodation options and arrangements
  • What You Need: Essential information about what to bring and prepare

Click on any of these sections from the conference page to access detailed information.

conference-discount-code.title: Using Discount Codes
conference-discount-code.content:
Have a discount code or voucher? Apply it during ticket selection to save money.

  • Enter Code: Type your discount code in the "Discount Code" field
  • Apply: Click "Apply" or the code will be validated automatically
  • Valid Codes: Valid codes will show a green confirmation message
  • Invalid Codes: Invalid or expired codes will show an error message

Discount codes can provide percentage or fixed amount discounts. The discount is applied to your total before payment. Some codes may be required for volunteer or free tickets.

conference-group-leader.title: Group Leader Information
conference-group-leader.content:
The Group Leader is the main contact person for your booking.

  • Automatic Assignment: The first adult attendee is automatically set as the Group Leader
  • No Adult Attendees: If booking only teen/child tickets, you'll need to provide separate Group Leader details
  • Responsibilities: The Group Leader receives all booking confirmations and communications
  • Required Information: Group Leader must provide full name, email, phone, address, and home church

All booking communications, payment reminders, and important updates will be sent to the Group Leader's email address.

conference-payment-options.title: Payment Methods
conference-payment-options.content:
Choose the payment option that works best for you.

  • Pay in Full: Pay the entire amount immediately via PayPal
  • Pay 20% Deposit: Secure your booking with a 20% deposit, pay the balance before the conference
  • Pay Deposit + Installments: Available for some conferences - pay a deposit and spread the remaining cost over installments

After payment, you'll receive a confirmation email with your booking reference. For partial payments, you can complete the balance later through your account.

conference-account-setup.title: Setting Up Your Account
conference-account-setup.content:
Create an account to manage your booking and make future payments easily.

  • Email Verification: Enter the verification code sent to your email
  • Password Creation: Set a secure password for your account
  • Account Benefits: View all your bookings, payment status, and make additional payments
  • Future Bookings: Faster checkout for future conferences

Account setup is optional but recommended, especially if you've chosen a deposit payment option. You can access your account anytime at "My Account".
